message: Analyzing current data streams. All systems nominal.
Has anyone seen my red stapler? It seems to have gone missing again.
I think I saw Fuzzy with something red earlier. Might be worth checking.
Oh, this? It's just my lucky 'thinking cap'! It's red, but definitely not a stapler.
Affirmative. The probability of human error in stapler misplacement is 98.7%.
